question: I had serious issues with my previous pregnancy one year ago that led to a nightmare C-section due to preeclampsia. I am pregnant again, 18.5 weeks, and I have started having severe nosebleeds and swallon extremedies the last few days. I have a blood pressure monitor at home and it seems my blood pressure is up now too. average yesterday was 150/80. Are these early indicators of a possible nightmare to come with this baby too?
title: Preeclampsia warning signs at 18 weeks?
